Attritus.text: Have consulted business agent, who says ---

Auctio.text: Have consulted business agent, will post particulars

Audacia.text: Have consulted friends, will post you particulars

Audax.text: Have consulted legal adviser, who says ---

Audenter.text: Have consulted legal adviser, will post particulars

Aufero.text: Have consulted stockbroker, will post particulars

Augesco.text: When is the consultation fixed for

Augmen.text: Continue to advise fully by letter

Augurium.text: Continue to advise fully by telegram

Avaritia.text: Will reply on my return from the country

Avarus.text: Will telegraph on arrival in the country

Aveho.text: Will write on arrival in the country

Caballus.text: --- is in the country, will communicate with him and then reply
